body:
## Expected Behavior
No more CVEs found


## Actual Behavior

All versions of the Java dependency io.temporal:temporal-serviceclient currently published on Maven Central pull in a vulnerable version of io.grpc:grpc-netty-shaded (< 1.75.0).

This triggers a High-severity CVE in our corporate security scanners (CRA/Mend), and blocks builds for multiple teams using Temporal Java SDK.

**The vulnerability detected:**

**Package: io.grpc:grpc-netty-shaded**

**Affected version: 1.58.1 (and any < 1.75.0)**

**CVE: CVE-2025-55163**

**Severity: High**

**Description: Netty/HTTP2 “MadeYouReset” DDoS vulnerability**

**Fix version: 1.75.0**

Reference: [https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-55163](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-55163)

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

 Code Risk Analyzer vulnerability scan

comments.body: it will be helpful to link the duplicate issue

title: Temporal Java SDK / temporal-serviceclient uses vulnerable grpc-netty-shaded (<1.75.0) — CVE-2025-55163 (High severity)
